articles.title: Indiabulls Housing Finance Witnesses Rs 40.8 Crore Block Deal, Shares Rally Over 12% - EquityPandit
articles.description: Shares of Indiabulls Housing Finance witnessed the biggest single-day gain since June 4, 2021, after a Rs 40.8 crore block deal on September 13. The home loan provider witnessed 22.5 lakh shares, amounting to nearly 0.5% of the total equity, change hands on t…
articles.content:
Shares of Indiabulls Housing Finance witnessed the biggest single-day gain since June 4, 2021, after a Rs 40.8 crore block deal on September 13.

articles.author: Nigel D'Souza
articles.title: Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders raises FY24 revenue growth guidance, says order book will last 4-5 years - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The company's order book has been on a declining trend over the last five years, starting from over Rs 55,000 crore in financial year 2019 to Rs 39,000 crore currently.

articles.author: Hormaz Fatakia
articles.title: Vedanta shares fall to a 52-week low - Know how much more can the stock fall as per charts - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Vedanta's shares are now down 27 percent so far in 2023. The stock had declined another 10 percent in 2022. Shares had doubled in value in 2021 riding on a strong commodity cycle and Anil Agarwal-led promoters partially increasing their stake in the company.
